mapper.select: select b.dept_nm, a.stu_name from student_tb a, dept_tb b where a.dept_cd = b.dept_cd and a.stu_no="2020101"

select a.sub_nm, d.prof_nm, subroom_nm, LEC_1, LEC_2, LEC_3 from subject_tb a, student_tb b, attend_tb c, professor_tb d where a.sub_cd = c.sub_cd and b.stu_no = c.stu_no and a.prof_cd = d.prof_cd and c.stu_no=#{stu_no}
